mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUST (custpin, custid, linkedlogin, password, email, signdate) VALUES (CUST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{custid}, 'N', #{password}, #{email}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE CUST SET password=#{password}, email=#{email}, profileimgname=#{profileimgname}, custname = #{custname}, nickname = #{nickname}, introduction = #{introduction}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, location = #{location} WHERE custid = #{custid}
